mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo ( username, nickname, email, ip, interest, sns, zonecode, address1, address2) VALUES(#{username},#{nickname},#{email},#{ip},#{interest},#{sns},#{zonecode},#{address1},#{address2})
mapper.select: SELECT m.username,m.password,m.enabled,a.authority,b.kakao_id FROM users m LEFT OUTER JOIN authorities a on m.username=a.username LEFT OUTER JOIN user_sns b on m.username=b.username WHERE m.username=#{username}
